newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks mixed, volumes lower.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks mixed, volumes lower.

text.p: Croatian stocks were mixed in lower volume on Thursday and leading issues registered slight corrections.
* Six of 14 active issues rose, four fell and four were flat.
* Volume dropped to 3,451 shares but turnover was higher at just under three million kuna.
* Biggest gainer was Dalmatinska banka, rising 40 kuna to 430 on modest volume of 50 shares.
* Leading decliner was drugs firm Pliva which lost 13 kuna to 451 with only 36 shares sold.
* Most actively traded issue was food concern Podravka, down two kuna to 308 with 760 shares changing hands.
